page.title: 09FARMING IN APPLETON WISKE
page.content:
SPINNER, MANGLE SOWER, AND MUCK SPREADER AND 2 TRAILERS.
MR GEORGE HAW IS A FARM HAND, HE LIVES AT CROSS HILL FARM AND WORKS FOR MR ELSDON. HE STARTED WORK AT 15 IN 1953. CROSS HILL FARM IS A MIXED FARM PARTLY STOCK AND PARTLY ARABLE. ON A WORKING DAY HE GETS UP AT 7.00 AND STARTS WORK AT 8.00. HE STOPS FOR LUNCH AT 12.30 AND HAS DINNER AT 17.30. HE DOES A VARIETY OF JOBS TRACTOR DRIVING HAY MAKING ETC. ON A TYPICAL DAY MONDAY 8 JULY HE MIXED MEAL, GOT THE CHICKEN HOUSE READY, FED BARLEY TO THE BULLS AND PIGS AND THEN HE MUCKED THE PIGS OUT.
